CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 11, 1967, pg. 13, reads: "RECEIVED CITATIONS - Because they gave freely of their time and energies to the fight for freedom and equal justice for all peoples, this group received special citation at the NAACP Women's Auxiliary Dinner-Dance. Seated from left: Mrs. Saya Feldman, Mrs. Rose Marie Payne, Mrs. Mitzi Trachtenberg and Mrs. Helen Peeler Evans. Standing from left: Cato Winebush, the Rev. C. E. McFadden, John Grice, Vincent Wilson, Charles Moore, Richard Cohen, Robert Boulden, and Dr. Oscar Gonzales."Accompanying article reads: "An overflow crowd packed the main ballroom of the Pick-Roosevelt Hotel recently when the Women's Auxiliary of the Pittsburgh Branch  NAACP sponsored its second annual "Daisy E. Lampkin Award" Dinner-Dance..."
TitMainTitle: Award recipients, seated from left: Saya Feldman, Rose Marie Mitchell Payne, Mitzi Trachtenberg, Helen Peeler Evans; standing: Cato Winebush, Rev. C. E. McFadden, John Grice, Vincent Wilson, Charles Moore, Richard Cohen, Robert Boulden, and Dr. Oscar Gonzales, at Women's Auxiliary of NAACP dinner dance, Roosevelt Hotel
